EmailTemplate.description: Auto-notification sent to Contact Owner when YPPG expresses an interest in the Autumn programme
EmailTemplate.name: Interested in autumn
EmailTemplate.subject: YPPG has expressed in the Autumn Programme
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.OwnerFirstName}
{!Contact.Name} has notified us that they would like a call about signing up to the Autumn Programme. Please call YPPG to discuss this.
Once discussed, please complete the Autumn Programme 2013 section on the Young Person Contact in Salesforce
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever a YPPG indicate their interest in the Autumn Programme
